description: Everyone discusses what should be an appropriate thought for the day. A mysterious boy enters the Gokuldham Society and claims to know Sodhi. Who could it be?
Sodhi raises his concerns about Bittu's suspicious behaviour. Bittu opens up about the troubles he is facing at school and home. How will Sodhi deal with the situation?
Bittu threatens to run away if he gets forced to continue studying. He later helps Sodhi at his garage. Has Bittu found his passion?
Nattu Kaka comes up with a marketing plan to increase sales for Gada electronics. Meanwhile, Sodhi takes Tapu Sena and Bittu to a mall.
Due to the rains, Bhide shifts the soda meeting to the clubhouse. Bhide convinces everyone to take responsibility for helping Bittu. Will they succeed?
After Bittu runs away, Sodhi takes Goli's help to track and find him. Everyone sits with Bittu and tries to counsel him. Will he understand what the grown-ups have to say?
The colony members are worried about Bittu running away due to his hatred towards studying. Will Bittu be found and will he finally realise the importance of education?
Bittu finally realises his mistakes and agrees to concentrate on his studies. Meanwhile, his parents come and are shocked to see the difference in their son.

The society members struggle to keep up with the rising cost of living in the city. Popatlal receives a call from the bank asking him to clear his locker and take his belongings before the branch shuts down.
Popatlal lives a paranoid life because of not having a locker for his jewellery. Can the Gokuldham residents find him a locker?
Popatlal spends sleepless nights in his house thinking about his jewellery's safety. He finally comes to the conclusion that he must keep the box in one of his neighbour's houses.
Popatlal decides to keep the jewellery box at Bhide's house. However, Bhide later finds out that Popatlal is going out of town. Will Bhide be able to keep the jewellery safe?
Bhide gets paranoid after getting Popatlal's jewellery and desperately looks for someone else to pass on the responsibility. Who will he find?

Episode_title: Popatlal Ke Zewar Hue Idhar Se Udhar
description: Jethalal tries to pass on the responsibility of the jewellery by giving the box to Babita. Will Popatlal's jewellery get mishandled?
Babita passes on the responsibility of the jewellery to Anjali, as she and Iyer have to go somewhere. Will Anjali keep the box or will the exchange of hands continue?
Popatlal's jewellery ends up at Sodhi's house. However, due to an emergency, Sodhi has to rush to his garage. Will the box be safe at Sodhi's house?
Popatlal returns after finishing his work and thanks Bhide for keeping his jewellery safely. How will he react when he finds out the truth?
Everyone tries to get Popatlal's box back from the person they gave it to. Jethalal begins to get a bad feeling about the jewellery box. Will his fears come true?
Sodhi and his wife realise that they have messed up and given away the box of jewellery to Abdul without informing him what's in it. Can the Sodhis recover the box?
All the residents of Gokuldham society panic as they start blaming each other for the missing Jewellery box. Can they manage to find the box and return it to Popatlal?

Bhide panics at the thought of Popatlal finding out that he has lost his jewellery box, but the society members reassure him that they all will take responsibility for the mistake. Will they find the jewellery or face Popatlal's wrath?
Bhide and Jethalal make excuses in front of Popatlal to delay giving the box. Will Popatlal fall for their lies?
The society members are shocked to see Popatlal with Sodhi's party sharty bag with the jewellery in it. How did Popatlal get his hands on it?
After everyone finds the empty jewellery box, they call Bhide to ensure it contains jewellery. How will the members of Gokuldham find the jewellery?
Jethalal and Sodhi take Tapu Sena's help to distract Popatlal. The members of Gokuldham meet Inspector Pandey and tell him about the theft.
The members of Gokuldham Society give Inspector Pandey a list of suspects in the robbery. The police are quick to respond and round up the suspects. Will they find Popatlal's jewellery?
Inspector Pandey's investigation reveals that the suspects are not guilty of the theft. He insists on checking every household of the Gokuldham members. What will he find?
Jethalal gets arrested when Popatlal's jewellery is found at his house. Everyone apologises to Inspector Pandey and requests him to let Jethalal go.
Tapu Sena is surprised to hear about the gold being recovered at Jethalal's home. Meanwhile, Jethalal arranges a locker for Popatlal.
Bhide receives a piece of good news early in the morning. He decides to surprise his family and take Sodhi's help.
Goli tells Tapu Sena about Bhide's plan to buy a car. When Sonu does not believe the news, they plan to put on a disguise to follow Sodhi and Bhide to find out the truth.
Sodhi takes Bhide to a used car shop to look at all the cars that fall into his budget. Goli and Pinku follow them around to find the truth. Which car will Bhide choose?
Sonu does not believe Goli when he tells her that Bhide has bought a car. Goli also lets Popatlal know about Bhide's surprise. How will Popatlal react?
Everyone gathers at Popatlal's house to discuss Bhide's surprise. Jethalal returns home and lets Bapuji in on the news.
Bhide can't wait to surprise his family with the new car, but how will his family react to this? Meanwhile, Tapu Sena plans on putting the 'Tiranga' in every house.
The members of Gokuldham Society make preparations to welcome Bhide's new car. Bhide and Sodhi get shocked when they see the car enter the society. What could have gone wrong?

Bhide shocks everyone by telling them that he was only helping a friend buy a car. Soon, Bhide reveals his real surprise for his wife and daughter. Later, the members of Gokuldham gather to celebrate 75 years of independence.
Roshan goes out of town to meet her family but warns Sodhi not to do 'party-sharty' at home. Will Sodhi go behind her back and break the rules?
The Gokuldham society members get together and celebrate Nowruz with Roshan. Meanwhile, Sodhi and his friends contemplate their 'party-sharty' plan.
Sodhi plans a party with his friends in Roshan's absence. Will he get caught?
Roshan finally gets to know about Sodhi's elaborate plan and how everyone was involved in it. Later, the entire colony prays for each other's well-being.
The members of Gokuldham society make preparations to celebrate Janmashtami. Will everything go smooth?
The members of the Gokuldham colony are excited to start the 'Dahi handi' proceedings. Will everything go smooth?
Things get competitive in the Gokuldham colony as all the participants try to break the Handi. Who will win the competition?

Bapuji is starving and asks Jethalal to order food for him, but Jethalal informs him that Komal would be sending them breakfast. However, when the breakfast arrives, Jethalal gets shocked to see the contents.
Jethalal gets frustrated with Bagha and Nattu Kaka when they delay giving him some good news. What's waiting in line for Jethalal?
Jethalal is excited about the opportunity of going to the United States of America. Will he be able to leave on such short notice?
Jethalal shares his happiness with all the colony members. Meanwhile, Bhide is still upset about Popatlal's taunts
Jethalal prepares for his journey to the United States of America. Will Jethalal's trip be successful?
The members of Gokuldham colony visit Jethalal with various requests, before he leaves for America. How will Jethalal react to this?
All the neighbours come to see off Jethalal before his departure for America. However, they are worried if Bapuji will be okay while living alone.
The society members call for a meeting to work out a plan on how to take care of Bapuji during Jethalal's absence.
As Jethalal leaves for the United States, Bapuji becomes lonely at home. Will he be okay during his time alone?
All the neighbours come to support Bapuji as she spends his first night alone.
Bapuji makes a plan to meet his childhood friend for breakfast, but knowing how the Gokuldham colony is, will he make it on time?
Everyone in the colony goes out of their way to take care of Bapuji. Will everything go smooth?
Bapuji doesn't open his door or answer his phone and sends the entire colony into panic mode. Is Bapuji alright?
Bapuji gets fed up with his neighbours being over-enthusiastic about taking care of him. Will they be understanding and take a step back?
The Gokuldham Colony members are excited about welcoming Bappa. Will everything go according to plan?
Gokuldham colony welcomes Bappa with an open heart. How will they celebrate this auspicious occasion?
The members of the Gokuldham colony celebrate Bappa's arrival but Anjali expresses her concerns about Taarak not being with her on this auspicious occasion.
Anjali is upset about Taarak not being around during Ganpati but will his gift make up for it?
The entire colony is surprised to see Taarak return for the Ganpati celebrations. Meanwhile, Sodhi, Popatlal and Hathi want to know Bhide's questions in advance.
The entire colony prepares for the Rangarang Karyakram. Will everything go smooth during the function?
Gokuldham residents begin the Rangarang Karyakram and invite a special guest to host the entire program. Who will the special guest be?
Sugandha plays a fun quiz with the Gokuldham residents about the famous temples of India. Who will score the most points and win the game?
The Rangarang Karyakram continues as Sugandha quizzes Babita, Madhavi and Bhide about the famous heritage sites in India. Will they be able to answer all the questions correctly?
Sodhi, Popatlal, and Anjali are next in line to participate in Sugandha's quiz. Will they be able to answer all the questions correctly?
Tapu Sena, Iyer, and Taarak take on the challenge of answering all the quiz questions correctly. Will they be successful?
Abdul delivers a surprise performance for the Rangarang Karyakram. Meanwhile, Nattu Kaka and Bagha are next in line for the quiz.
Anjali catches Taarak eating samosas with Tapu Sena. Meanwhile, Taarak gets the responsibility of holding Shradh for his late father. Will Taarak be able to perform this important ritual properly?
Taarak and the society members prepare for his father's Shradh. Will everything go smooth?
Taarak is worried as he can't find crows to eat his offerings. Gogi, Pinku, and the others offer their help to make the Shradh successful. Will things go in Taarak's favour this time?
Taarak finally finds a few crows to eat the Shradh food, but Sodhi unknowingly scares them away. When Taarak is about to lose all hope, Abdul comes up with a unique solution. Will Abdul's idea work?
Taarak and the others make their way to a park to look for crows. However, things take a turn for the worse when a thief steals Taarak's phone. What will he do now?
Jethalal's family and friends are eagerly waiting for him to return from his USA trip. However, no one has spoken to him in the past two days. Will Jethalal return home safely?
Jethalal returns to India without informing about his arrival to any of the society members. Will he return home safely?
After returning from the USA, three thieves rob Jethalal and steal all of his belongings. What will he do now?
Jethalal tries to file a complaint at the police station about the robbery. But Chalu Pandey refuses to take his complaint and locks him up instead. What will happen now?
Chalu Pandey lets Jethalal, and the others go after listening to their explanation. Jethalal reaches Gokuldham and decides to surprise Bapuji.
Jethalal brings a special shirt for Bapuji from his US trip. However, Jethalal is unaware that someone has mistakenly replaced the shirt with a frock. What will happen now?
Jethalal calls Taarak at his office, which puts Taarak's job at risk. How will he handle this situation?
Gokuldham residents are eagerly waiting for the Navratri celebrations to begin. Meanwhile, Jethalal finds it difficult to fit into his old Garba dress.

Jethalal wants to perform the first aarti of Navratri to pray for Daya's return. However, Bhide says that he has to take permission from all society members first. Will the society members accept his request?
Jethalal gets the opportunity to perform the first aarti of Navratri. However, he gets called to Lonavala for an important meeting. What will happen now?
Everyone begins to worry, as Jethalal is getting late for the aarti. Will Jethalal be able to get back in time?
Jethalal manages to reach on time and performs the first aarti of Navratri. Later, all the Gokuldham residents play Garba together.

Episode_title: The Last Film Show In Gokuldham
description: Asit Modi brings the star of Chhello Show, Bhavin Rabari and the director, Pan Nalin, to meet all of their favourite Gokuldham residents.
Bhide shares his mantra for savings with Tapu Sena. Meanwhile, Nattu Kaka and Bagha remind Jethalal about submitting his maintenance cheque.
Bhide celebrates when Jethalal brings the maintenance cheque on time. However, a silly mistake by Jethalal quickly spoils the celebration.
Bhide finds out that Tapu is about to return to Gokuldham. Meanwhile, Jethalal scolds Nattu Kaka about spoiling his maintenance cheque.
Jethalal brings Bapuji to Dr Hathi's clinic to treat his stomach ache. Meanwhile, Gokuldham society members are worried about the moss build-up in the society compound.
Dr Hathi slips and falls in the society compound because of the moss build-up. Will the society members be able to lift him up?
Sodhi comes up with a unique solution to lift Dr Hathi up from the ground. Will his plan work?
The members of Gokuldham society decide to repaint the colony but Bhide struggles to find a contractor who is ready to do the job before Diwali. Can a solution be found?
The members of Gokuldham society interview multiple contractors and ask for their budget for repainting their colony. Will a suitable contractor be found on time?
Tapu Sena helps Abdul test the new firecrackers at his shop. Meanwhile, the committee members gather at the clubhouse to finalize a contractor.
Society members sit down for a meeting to select the best contractor out of the top four. Will they be able to make a sound decision?
After interviewing all the contractors, the society members decide to shortlist one. Who will be the one to get the job?
Gokuldham residents decide to give the contract for painting the society to Raju Chamke. Will things go according to plan?
